name: qa-metric-dashboard
description: Micro SaaS QA Metric Dashboard (Express + SQLite/Postgres + Tailwind + Alpine + Chart.js via CDN)

scripts.stop: powershell -Command "$process = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique; if ($process) { Stop-Process -Id $process -Force; Write-Host 'Server stopped on port 3000' } else { Write-Host 'No server running on port 3000' }"
